dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is often seen as the solution to the challenge of providing health care for an increasing number of people with chronic conditions Projects are often organised locally and based on the involvement of stakeholders with a wide range of backgrounds It can be challenging to ensure that projects are based on previous experience and that they do not repeat previous studies To better understand these challenges and current practice we examined telemedicine projects funded in the 2008 2010 period to explore where how and to what extent results from the projects were documented and disseminated
Collaborative efforts are needed to ensure proper knowledge dissemination of telemedicine projects.
